cab.content: This Document is the Property ofHis dmannic ajesty'c Government.)Secret 1312-From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,2nd March 1920.(Received 3rd.)2792. 2nd March. Tashkend Wireless continues strongly anti-British tone. Following Press message is example, dated 24th February : " There are accounts of rising against Persia in Tabreez area. Extracts are given from Bolshevik Press of Baku, accusing British for manipulation of exchange and for high prices throughout Caucasus. Gulcha in Ferghana captured by Red troops with much booty and consequent early resumption of trade with Kashgar. Long and violent proclamation published by Mahometan Communist Party of Tashkend denouncing the stranglers of the East and imploring people of down-trodden Orient to strike simultaneously such resounding blows in Constantinople, Baghdad, Cairo, Tehran, Delhi, and Peking as will result in the annihilation of the accursed oppressors."
